ei.service.ctr
Class CTR

java.lang.Object
  jade.core.Agent
      ei.EIAgent
          ei.service.PlatformService
              ei.service.ctr.CTR
All Implemented Interfaces:
jade.core.TimerListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable
public class CTR
extends PlatformService

This class provides the Computational Trust and Reputation service. The CTR service receives information from Normative Environment service regarding the activity of external agents and provide a list of external agents that fulfill the provided requirements, and information about agents. The computational trust and reputation service implements the following interaction protocol roles:

  • the CTR responder role
  • the NormEnv subscription initiator role
  • the DF subscription initiator role

Author:
Sérgio
